title: Ayaz expresses sorrow over loss of lives in Swat Motorway accident
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 16 (APP):Speaker National Assembly Sardar Ayaz Sadiq has expressed profound sorrow and grief over the tragic traffic accident on the Swat Motorway.
In his condolence message, the Speaker extended heartfelt sympathies and condolences to the bereaved families of those who lost their lives in the unfortunate incident.
“I share the grief of the families who have lost their loved ones in this tragic accident,” said Ayaz Sadiq, adding that he was deeply saddened by the loss of precious human lives in the accident.
The Speaker prayed to Almighty Allah for the elevation of the ranks of the deceased and for granting patience to the bereaved families.
He also prayed for the speedy recovery of those injured in the accident.
